ComicInfo.Summary:
Number 4 in the Lobster Johnson series.
With his allies dead, the Lobster must fight his way through a mutated menagerie of mystical and scientific abominations to stop the sinister machinations of his mysterious adversary. After years of captivating fans from the pages of Hellboy and B.P.R.D., the pulp-style adventures of Lobster Johnson take the limelight in the character's first solo series. Written and with covers by Hellboy creator Mike Mignola, and drawn by Jason Armstrong (Ferro City, The Sensational Spider-Man), Lobster Johnson: The Iron Prometheus is a wild ride full of fearsome monsters, mad scientists, and threats from the world beyond.
ComicInfo.Tags: Adolfo Flores,Helena Gallaragas,Lester,Jim Sacks,Bill,Professor Kyriakos Gallaragas,Robert Isherwood,Nazis,The Lobster,Harry McTell,Memnan Saa
ComicInfo.Title: The Iron Prometheus
